The Hope and Homes for Children name and logo

The Hope and Homes for Children name and emblem are the exclusive property of Hope and Homes for Children. They are protected under international law. Unauthorised use is prohibited. They may not be copied or reproduced in any way without the prior written permission of Hope and Homes for Children. Requests for permission can be done by emailing us.

The Hope and Homes for Children website

The Hope and Homes for Children website is provided by Hope and Homes for Children for personal use and educational purposes only. Any other use, including reproduction or translation of, or any use other than for personal or educational purposes, requires the express prior written permission of Hope and Homes for Children. Requests for permission can be done by emailing us specifying full details of the proposed use.

All content of the Hope and Homes for Children website is protected by law including, as applicable, copyright laws. The content of the Hope and Homes for Children Website is selected on the basis of Hope and Homes for Children’s own criteria and in it’s own sole discretion. Hope and Homes for Children reserves the right at any time to change or discontinue any aspect or feature of the website, including but not limited to these terms of use, hours of availability, and equipment needed for use.

The use of particular designations of countries or territories does not imply any judgement by Hope and Homes for Children as to the legal status of such countries or territories, of their authorities and institutions, or of the delimitation of their boundaries. The mention of names of specific companies or products (whether or not indicated as registered) does not imply any intention to infringe proprietary rights, nor should it be construed as an endorsement or recommendation on the part of Hope and Homes for Children.

Hope and Homes for Children disclaim any liability or responsibility arising from the use of the Hope and Homes for Children website or the content of the Hope and Homes for Children website. No representations or warranties of any kind concerning the Hope and Homes for Children website are given, including responsibility for any infection by virus or any other contamination or by anything, which has destructive properties.

Copyright © Hope and Homes for Children

Hope and Homes for Children offers its information on the internet essentially for the benefit of individuals interested in its efforts to work with orphaned and abandoned children. If you wish to mirror, reproduce, republish or translate any of the information for wider dissemination, please email us with details of such proposed use, including the nature and size of the intended audience.
Hope and Homes for Children reserves all copyrights on material on its web pages, including photographs and graphic designs. The use of Hope and Homes for Children internet material for any purpose, including repackaging in hard copy or compilation for CD-ROM or any other electronic media, is prohibited unless prior written permission is obtained. The unauthorised use of the Hope and Homes for Children name and logo is against international law and is expressly forbidden.

Use of imagery and personal testimonies

Some photographs are used for representational purposes only. Individual stories and photographs are changed to protect children’s identities. To use any imagery from the Hope and Homes for Children website please email us.

Other websites

The Hope and Homes for Children website may be linked to other websites that are not under Hope and Homes for Children’s control. Hope and Homes for Children provides these links merely as a convenience and the inclusion of such links does not imply an endorsement or approval by Hope and Homes for Children of any website, product or service.
Hope and Homes for Children does not assume any responsibility or liability in respect of such websites, including, for example, responsibility or liability for the accuracy or reliability of any information, data, opinions, advice or statements made on those websites. Requests for permission for linking a website to the Hope and Homes for Children website can be done by emailing us.
